Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Internazionale in Barano d'Ischia (Fiaiano), you'll be convenient to Indiana Park and Castiglione Thermal Park. This hotel is within close proximity of Piazza degli Eroi and Nitrodi Hot Springs.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 39 guestrooms. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include desks and in-room massages, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on recreational opportunities including an outdoor pool and a spa tub. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and wedding services. The complimentary beach shuttle makes getting to the surf and sand a breeze.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, where you can take in a garden view, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, a computer station, and a 24-hour front desk. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.
